messages.subject: Re: Unschooling Cons
messages.msgSnippet: I feel like I m in one of those 50 s movies where they say Let s clean out the barn and put on a play!!! Let s have a New England Unschooling Conference!
messages.messageBody:
I feel like I'm in one of those 50's movies where they say "Let's clean out
the barn and put on a play!!!"

Let's have a New England Unschooling Conference!

I'll coordinate if others will help. E-mail me.
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: Unschooling Cons
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/26/2003 3:06:29 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Oh, Julian and I went to the last one GWS did right as we started homeschooling! It was
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/26/2003 3:06:29 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

>
> GWS used to have them in Boston. Where's the FUNschooling thing?
> Maryland?
> WAY down south somewhere? <g>
>
>

Oh, Julian and I went to the last one GWS did right as we started
homeschooling!

It was incredible! The workshops were wonderful, and the place was amazing.
Julian was just 8, and he had always pretty much been around an adult most of
the time all his life. There, however, he found things he wanted to do, and
met me at specific times. It was cool, because it felt safe to let him do
that, and he felt good. He spent one whole afternoon in a kayak, and fell in
love. Now he has his own, and it's still a passion.

What a cool conference that was!
Kathryn
